Reviews.Title: “Affordable hotel in an exclusive part of London”
Reviews.Author: wonder-luster
Reviews.Content: checked hotel midway london stay hot water apartment hotel walking distance gloucester rd station quiet safe neighborhood amenities nearby waitrose pubs restaurants etc paid 125 gbp triple sharing 135 gbp triple walk hotel 24 hr counter service equipped lift provides luggage hold customers late flights london 107 amply spacious heated quiet facing courtyard bathroom fairly water pressure simple toiletries provided continental breakfast included stay tv reception poor regular reception overall location price ideal short stay london

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”

Reviews.Content: stayed 13 days february 2011 nice time hotel located quiet street close gloucester road tube station waitrose restaurants breakfast included price ok life worst coffe tea toasts jam unfortunately wifi reception isnt nice
